title: fsl_mvlm
description: Multivariate Linear Model regression on time courses and/or 3D/4D images using SVD (PCA), PLS, normalised PLS, CVA, SVD-CVA or MLM

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Input file (text matrix or 3D/4D image file)

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: Algorithm for decomposition: PCA (or SVD; default), PLS, orthoPLS, CVA, SVD-CVA, MLM, NMF

design_matrix.title: Design matrix file
design_matrix.description: File name of the GLM design matrix (time courses or spatial maps)

mask_image.title: Mask image file
mask_image.description: Mask image file name if input is an image

design_normalization.title: Design normalization flag
design_normalization.description: Switch on normalisation of the design matrix columns to unit standard deviation

demean.title: Demean flag
demean.description: Switch on de-meaning of design and data

nmf_dim.title: NMF dimension
nmf_dim.description: Number of underlying factors for NMF

out_data.title: Output data file
out_data.description: Output file name for pre-processed data

out_vnscales.title: Variance normalisation scales file
out_vnscales.description: Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation
